message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to get this product.
